AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cave child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed in a cave and left behind by [PAWN_possessive] mother immediately. [PAWN_pronoun] had to survive all on [PAWN_possessive] own in the depths of the earth.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: greedy kid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was at the top of the food chain amongst the children of [PAWN_possessive] clan. [PAWN_pronoun] used this position to take all the best food and toys from [PAWN_possessive] peers, a tendency which earned few friends.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: spawn
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was not born through natural means. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] was birthed in the Growth Vats of a powerful dark lord's base. He was completely deprived of a childhood and got spit out of the Growth Vat as an adult.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: foundling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned by [PAWN_possessive] tribe at birth for unknown reasons. [PAWN_nameDef] was found by an alien couple and raised as their own, despite [PAWN_possessive] species.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Banker's Son
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a family of respected bankers. [PAWN_possessive] parents always expected [PAWN_possessive] to follow in the family business.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: feral
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned by [PAWN_possessive] parents as an infant. Somehow, [PAWN_pronoun] survived on his own in the wilds, but [PAWN_possessive] isolation from society stunted [PAWN_possessive] social skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: beggar
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a large city that was populated by non-Goblin sapient races. There was a great deal of anti-goblin prejudice in the city, so [PAWN_possessive] parents were unable to find work. As a result, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to beg for a living.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cauldron keeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In [PAWN_nameDef]'s family, all food was collectively gathered in a central cauldron where it was rendered into stew and shared amongst the group. As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned the task of stirring the pot and keeping the flame beneath it going.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cannibal cauldron keeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In [PAWN_nameDef]'s family, all food was collectively gathered in a central cauldron where it was rendered into stew and shared between the group. As a teenager, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned the task of stirring the pot and keeping the flame beneath it going. He would secretly add the flesh of dead raiders into the pot. [PAWN_nameDef] found that [PAWN_pronoun] quite liked the taste, and no one ever caught [PAWN_objective] doing it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: animal lover
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Unlike most in [PAWN_possessive] tribe, [PAWN_nameDef] loved animals for more than just their meat!

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: collector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was constantly making collections of random items [PAWN_pronoun] found near [PAWN_possessive] village. While it was mostly junk, some of these things quite useful and [PAWN_pronoun] learned a lot by messing with them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: nomadic child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up living the life of a nomad and was raised by a band of fellow travelers. They mostly survived by foraging or performing for money, both of which taught useful skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cave goblin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a complex series of caves with [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] had to become adept at mining to survive.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: goblin berserker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found for [PAWN_possessive] on the front lines as a vicious berserker, entering into feral-like trances in the heat of battle. [PAWN_pronoun] slew many foes along the way. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed the feeling of [PAWN_possessive] enemy's blood on [PAWN_possessive] hands.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Scrap Engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a fascination for new putting together new devices with whatever materials [PAWN_pronoun] had at hand. While [PAWN_possessive] inventions and constructions were crude, they got the job done.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: forager
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with foraging through flora gathering food and herbs for [PAWN_possessive] tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: poisoner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] synthesized poisons from various ingredients. These poisons were applied to all his Faction's weapons to give them an edge in battles.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] went out into the wilds, hunting game to supplement [PAWN_possessive] people's diet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slave of the Dark Lord
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As has been the fate of many creatures over the millenia, [PAWN_nameDef] was for many years a conscript in the armies of some dark lord or another. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to fight on the front lines as cannon fodder. It was a miracle that [PAWN_pronoun] survived.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: overseer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the infernal legions of an evil overlord willingly. [PAWN_pronoun] rose through the ranks quickly through ruthless cunning, eventually attaining the highest rank that his servant could earn: Overseer. In this role [PAWN_pronoun] operated by the principle of: 'Where there's a whip, there's a way!'.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: banker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the family business when [PAWN_pronoun] reached adulthood, becoming extremely rich in the process.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: weaver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of weaving cloth and leather into clothing for [PAWN_possessive] tribe, a task which [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: goblin clown
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a clown serving the court of a nobleman. [PAWN_pronoun] was treated horribly- constantly humiliated and belittled by the courtiers and other servants. Eventually [PAWN_pronoun] escaped, but was left with lifelong trauma.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: thief
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living as a thief in a city. [PAWN_pronoun] was quite crafty, but eventually the heat became too great and [PAWN_pronoun] had to skip town.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ex-Warlord
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] came into control of a powerful goblin horde, power which [PAWN_pronoun] used to launch a vast war of annihilation against the inhabitants of [PAWN_possessive] planet. Many thousands died before [PAWN_possessive] were eventually defeated.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: goblin rights activist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] constantly in the shadow of the prejudice against [PAWN_possessive] people felt by many other creatures. As an adult, [PAWN_pronoun] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to advocating for the rights of goblins everywhere. [PAWN_nameDef] swore off violence to prove that [PAWN_possessive] people were not all savages.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fanatical devotee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years in special brainwashing programs which turned [PAWN_objective] into the perfect unquestioning kiling machine for [PAWN_possessive] warlord. [PAWN_pronoun] was sent on numerous suicidal missions, but somehow always survived.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Night Haunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived alone out in the wilds. [PAWN_pronoun] survived by sneaking into the homes of unsuspecting Pawns during the middle of the night, killing them, and then eating the bodies. [PAWN_possessive] crimes were infamous and [PAWN_nameDef] quickly gained the nickname 'The Night Haunter'.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: deserter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After countless meaningless battles in the service of a warlord, [PAWN_nameDef] grew tired of the violence and deserted the army to live a life of peace as a farmer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Subterranean Lord
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ruled over a subterranean society of near-feral goblins. [PAWN_pronoun] expected constant devotion and service from all [PAWN_possessive] servants and grew prodigiously fat as a result.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tribal healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] gathered herbs and other ingredients for use in various healing concotions that [PAWN_possessive] tribe needed.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: city goblin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living in an urban center on [PAWN_possessive] home world. Finding work was tough, but [PAWN_pronoun] was able to find various odd jobs to make ends meet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Craft Slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was enslaved for many years in the vast forges of a Dark Lord, forging thousands upon thousands of blades, clubs, and other weapons for service in [PAWN_possessive] master's never ending war against the freemen of the region.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Trophy-Keeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought in many battles, brawls, and general scuffles. Everytime [PAWN_pronoun] killed a foe, [PAWN_pronoun] made a special point of gathering a grisly trophy from the body- an ear, a nose, a finger, and so on. While not a particularly pleasant habit, it did give [PAWN_objective] a bit of knowledge about... anatomy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cauldron poisoning psychopath
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always a creepy child, known for [PAWN_possessive] tendencies to hurt animals out behind the barn. [PAWN_pronoun] was expelled by [PAWN_possessive] society after poisoning the central cauldron, solely to watch the suffering of others. They lived, but [PAWN_possessive] future victims would not be so lucky.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: evil toxicologist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ventured out and joined unethical "scientists", where he came to master the art of poison, engaged in torture and maddened experiments, and more. [PAWN_pronoun] would regularly harvest the organs of "patients" and then inject them with poison to see how it effects them. [PAWN_nameDef] became proficient in wielding poison as a weapon, too.
